QuestData.Title: Leyline Apprentice
QuestData.Description:
Good work finding those additional leyline feeds.
You seem rather competent - for an outlander.
Allow me to share with you a few secrets about the power of the leylines. This should help you in scavenging more ancient mana from the creatures around Suramar. A grisly task, I know - which is why I leave it to you!
